summary: HEATER STOPPED PRODUCING HEAT AFTER 35,000 MILES.  REQUIRED AN EXTENSIVE SYSTEMS FLUSH COSTING ALMOST $400.  SIX MONTHS LATER, HEATER CORE FAILED CAUSING COOLANT FUMES TO BE EXHAUSTED INTO THE PASSENGER COMPARTMENT WHERE YOUNG CHILDREN WERE RIDING.  REPLACEMENT OF HEATER CORE COST ALMOST $850.
